name: AVCaptureSynchronizedDepthData
desc: A container for scene depth information collected using synchronized capture.

items.name: var depthData: AVDepthData
items.desc: The depth data captured at this synchronization point.

items.name: var depthDataWasDropped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether depth data was discarded between capture and processing.

items.name: var droppedReason: AVCaptureOutput.DataDroppedReason
items.desc: A value indicating why the capture output failed to deliver depth data, if applicable.
